rules.fullName: Canada Customer Service Case Escalation assignment
rules.description: Escalate case to customer care manager queue when escalation levels are checked.
Sends notification to case owner and creator when a case is created
rules.formula: And( RecordType.Name = 'Customer PO Case', ischanged( Latest_Case_Comment__c) )

rules.fullName: Case Creation notification for Collector Case
rules.description: Sends notification to case owner and creator when a case is created with type Ebill
Sends notification reminders to case owner and manager if its not resolved after 24 hrs and 72 hrs

rules.fullName: Case assign to Walmart FedEx queue
rules.description: assign cases to walmart / fedex queue
rules.formula: and( text(LastModifiedBy.Sales_Person_Type__c) = 'Call Center Agent' , text(Owner:User.Sales_Person_Type__c) = 'Key Account Support' , or (Account.Key_Account_Name__c = 'Walmart- SK Oil - 87340' ,Account.Key_Account_Name__c = 'FedEx - 99795') )

rules.description: Sends notification to case owner and creator when a case is created
send email to call center director when an escalation case is created
Escalate case to customer care manager queue when escalation levels are checked.

rules.description: Escalate case to customer care manager queue when escalation levels are checked.
